title: What are some good and trendy topics to write articles on? - Quora

response.answer_text: Work From Home-: You can write topics related to remote working, as most people will look for remote work opportunities, because of the pandemic. Exercise:- People will look for stay at home exercise; it will be a smart choice to write on this topic. Mental Health & Self Care:- People will feel stressed, depressed, and bored (maybe already feeling!) during this social distancing phase. Mental health and self-care are a booming niche to write blogs for 2020. COVID-19:- Any information related to COVID is a trending topic now. But make sure the information you’ll provide its genuine. Tips on how to increase immunity and stay healthy are the most searched topic now. Entertainment:- People will spend most of their time in their homes. They will search for movies, Web shows, and entertainment. You can give them entertainment bites by writing on movies, Bollywood, Hollywood. Food:- People will search for recipes that are easy to make in homes. Digital Marketing:- Everyone depends on the digital world right now. This is the best time to write about niche related to digital marketing as people will spend most of their time online.  As for now, I can think about only theses trending topics. Do you have anything in mind? If yes, comment below and share it with us.  Thank you for reading.

I am sure you can find very interesting topics to write about related to the current scenario. You can also write on personal development, mental and physical health. I would like to suggest some topics: How to keep yourself mentally fit, How to keep yourself focused on work, etc.
